validate-shipping-methods-required-3.message: Sorry, no quotes are available for Shipping Methods at this time.

validate-shipping-methods-required-2.message: If you have already completed the detailed profiles of the previous block, but shipping methods did not appear - please send us email and we will select an individual option to ship your order.

validate-payment-methods-required-3.message: Sorry, no quotes are available for Payment Methods at this time.

validate-payment-methods-required-2.message: If you have already completed the detailed profiles of the previous block, but payment methods did not appear - please send us email and we will select an individual option to confirm payment for your order.
